scripts.start:prod: export NODE_ENV=prod && export PORT=8080 && forever -o ./log/console.log -e ./log/error.log start ./bin/www && forever list
scripts.start-cmd:prod: set NODE_ENV=prod && set PORT=8080 && forever -a -l /logfile.log  -o /console.log -e /error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.restart:prod: forever stopall && export NODE_ENV=prod && export PORT=8080 && forever -o ./log/console.log -e ./log/error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.start:test: export NODE_ENV=test && export PORT=8080 && forever -o ./log/console.log -e ./log/error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.restart:test: forever stopall && export NODE_ENV=test && export PORT=8080 && forever -o ./log/console.log -e ./log/error.log start ./bin/www
scripts.start-cmd:test: set NODE_ENV=test && set PORT=8080 && forever -a -l /logfile.log  -o /console.log -e /error.log start ./bin/www
